entry.title: Tiny Trophies - Utterly Gorgeous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Fun Gifts
Price: 2.25

Tiny Trophies are the perfect excuse for you to celebrate the people in your life - family, friends, a colleague - and share what they mean to you. Fun and playful, these miniature brass awards are a great gift to highlight a person’s qualities and let slip what you admire and love about them the most.

Each Tiny Trophy is easy to assemble, the base of the trophy simply folding to stand upright. Lightweight and packed flat, these cute, little awards are easy gifts to send in the post.

Contents: Tiny Trophy
Materials: Paper, Brass
Packaging Dimensions: 52mm x 148mm
Product Dimensions: 45 x 25 x 10mm

entry.title: Plant Award - Thriving
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 2.85

Celebrate all your plants achievements with these prized rosettes.

Plant Awards are fun miniature brass rosettes to recognise your skills in plant care. Decorate their leaves or pots and maybe your other plants will start behaving too!

There are 6 rosettes in the collection: New Leaf, Thriving, Still Alive, Plant Goals, Surviving and Dream Plant.

Etched in metal with a beautiful gold string to attach to your plants.

Contents: One metal rosette, gold thread
Materials: Brass, FSC paper
Packaging Dimensions: 52 x 148mm
Product Dimensions: 65 x 38mm

entry.title: London Panoramic Map
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Stationery
Price: 5.00

A beautifully illustrated map of London's Thames.

The fold-out map features over 100 buildings situated on the north and south banks between Tower Bridge and the Houses of Parliament. The architectural history of each building is plotted on the reverse, uncovering some forgotten stories and fascinating facts.

The rivers prominence within the capital city has ebbed and flowed through history with the architecture reflecting the evolution of changing lifestyles, technology and design.

Take a stroll along the riverbanks with our map as your guide, display it as a beautiful print or send as a souvenir to a fellow lover of London

Contents: Architectural map
Materials: Paper
Product Dimensions: 210 x 105mm
Packaging Dimensions: 210 x 105 x 5mm

entry.title: London Icon Bookmarks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Stationery
Price: 3.97

Top your books and files with a tiny piece of London's heritage - a great little gift for every London lover.

This London Icons set includes four stainless steel bookmarks; a miniature Black Cab, Post Box, Telephone Box and the famous Double-decker Bus.

Contents: Four page markers
Materials: Stainless steel, paper
Packaging Dimensions: 105 x 148mm

entry.title: Crown mini model
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Model Kits
Price: 5.25

A cute little dolls size crown for the special Prince, Princess, King or Queen in your life.

Each pack contains one brass model with step by step assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers may be helpful.

Contents: metal model, instructions
Materials: coated stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 38 x 38 x 40mm
Packaging Dimensions: 105 x 105mm
Product Weight: 10g

entry.title: Cocktail mini model
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Model Kits
Price: 5.25

Send a celebratory gift to make your own cocktail kit. Alcohol-free fun and a cute gift idea for party lovers.

Each pack contains one brass model with step by step assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers may be helpful.

Contents: metal model, instructions
Materials: coated stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 40 x 45 x 25mm
Packaging Dimensions: 105 x 105mm
Product Weight: 10g

entry.title: Sydney Bookmarks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Stationery
Price: 3.97

Iconic Sydney skyline set produced to scale of 4000 times smaller than the real buildings! 

Made from Stainless steel the set includes Sydney's Opera House, Tower, Harbour Bridge and the Queen Victoria Building.

A brilliant easy to post gift and souvenir for any Aussie lover.

Contents: Four page markers
Materials: Stainless steel, paper
Packaging Dimensions: 105 x 148mm

entry.title: MONUmini Battersea Power Station
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Model Kits
Price: 8.25

MONUmini is an iconic architectural model of Battersea Power Station; an immense building covering some 160m x 170m.

The kit includes a sheet of etched stainless steel pieces, which fold and lock together to create the miniature structure. It also includes step-by-step assembly instructions and a short building history all packed into an envelope making them a great, easy-to-post, souvenir. 

This is not a toy - the product contains sharp edges and is not suitable for young children.

Contents: metal model, instructions, building history
Materials: Stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 100 x 80 x 60mm
Packaging Dimensions: 165 x 230mm

entry.title: MONUmini Tower Bridge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Model Kits
Price: 8.25

MONUmini is an architectural model kit; a perfect memento or a fun gift for any design enthusiast or architect.

The kit includes a sheet of etched stainless steel pieces, which fold and lock together to create the miniature structure. It also includes step-by-step assembly instructions and a short building history all packed into an envelope making them a great, easy-to-post, souvenir.

Constructed in 1890's, Tower Bridge is a combined bascule and suspension bridge over the River Thames in London.

This is not a toy - the product contains sharp edges and is not suitable for children.

Contents: metal model, instructions, building history
Materials: Stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 170 x 40 x 50mm
Packaging Dimensions: 165 x 230mm
